name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Z Real Estate Scraper for Zillow

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract and save Zillow properties data and leads with no code to CSV or Google Sheet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension extracts the most comprehensive data from Zillow's real estate listings with one click and no code. 

You can download the data as a nicely formatted CSV file or Google Sheets organized by price, address, zip, # of beds, baths, square footage, price per square footage, listing URL, etc. for rentals, sold properties, ones for sale, LEADS (owner contact info, agent contact info, etc.) year built and more. It's a very simple extension that is easy to use and gets the job done.


üß™Core Features:
    ‚úîÔ∏èScrape unlimited Zillow real estate listings from the website
           - For sale
           - Sold
           - For rent
           - Favorites
           - Real estate agent search results
    ‚úîÔ∏èAutomatically navigate search result pages
    ‚úîÔ∏èDownload data into a formatted CSV file or Google Sheets including:
           - Price
           - Address, Beds, Baths, Sq. Footage
           - Listing URL
           - Price per Footage
           - Latitude/Longitude
           - Broker Name
           - Status (i.e. For sale?)
           - Property Type (i.e. Condo, SFH, etc.)
           - Lot Area Size
           - Rent Zestimate, Actual Rental Price Range
           - Zestimate
           - Tax Assessed Value
           - Latest Price Changes
           - Date Sold
           - Time on the Market
           - Days on Zillow
    ‚úîÔ∏èCustomize CSV/Google Sheets exported data format and columns
    ‚úîÔ∏èExtract leads and much more detailed information from individual listing pages:
           - Listing agent(s) phone and email
           - Owner phone and email
           - HOA fees
           - Most recent tax assessment value, property taxes
           - Year built
           - Garage capacity, # of stories, heating, cooling, and more...
    ‚úîÔ∏èNo coding or technical knowledge needed. It's super easy to use!



üîíPermissions:
We understand there may be questions regarding the permissions needed to use the extension. We aim to be as transparent as possible hoping to inform you that we have absolutely no intent of using the access you grant to your browser maliciously. Follow the link below to read on:

https://tidisventures.com/privacy-policy?policy=z-real-estate-scraper-chrome-ext-privacy-policy


‚≠ê How To Use:
The extension popup has 3 buttons that control the entire functionality of the app. Each button is to scrape the webpage, clear the data to scrape from scratch, and download the CSV file or save to Google Sheets respectively. To extract data, follow these steps:

   1. Go to Zillow.com and search for a location (i.e. Chicago)
   2. Open up the extension and click "Scrape". Don't close the pop up while it works.
   3. To scrape the next page, left click on page 2 (or automate this in the settings).
   4. Then, repeat step 2. (Click "Download" when you're ready to download the data to CSV or Google Sheets)

For more info, please see the YouTube video above to learn how to use the extension. If there are any questions or other issues, please contact tidisventures@gmail.com.

Also, check the how-to page: https://tidisventures.com/extensions/z-real-estate-scraper or the support page: https://tidisventures.com/support?app=z-real-estate-scraper


üè∑Ô∏èPricing:
Upon installation of the extension, the user will be able to use the basic and free version of the extension indefinitely. This limits the scraped listings to the first 50 listings per page (downloadable CSV file is available with the basic version). Upgrade to the premium version to  enjoy scraping unlimited listings from Zillow's website (and other awesome features).


üìöTerms and Conditions:
By using this extension, you agree to the terms here: https://tidisventures.com/terms-and-conditions?app=z-real-estate-scraper-terms


‚úãImportant:
Read more about the extension and its usage here: https://tidisventures.com/extensions/z-real-estate-scraper
